parameters.name: FirstRow
parameters.description: 0-based row number at the beginning of the selection range

parameters.name: LastRow
parameters.description: 0-based row number at the end of the selection range

parameters.name: FirstColumn
parameters.description: 0-based column number at the beginning of the selection range

parameters.name: LastColumn
parameters.description: 0-based column number at the end of the selection range

title: ISelectData.GetCellRange
description: Gets the specified range of table cells for this selection.
signature:
void GetCellRange( 
   out System.Int32
FirstRow
,
   out System.Int32
LastRow
,
   out System.Int32
FirstColumn
,
   out System.Int32
LastColumn
)

parameters.name: FirstRow
parameters.description: 0-based row number at the beginning of the selection range

parameters.name: LastRow
parameters.description: 0-based row number at the end of the selection range

parameters.name: FirstColumn
parameters.description: 0-based column number at the beginning of the selection range

parameters.name: LastColumn
parameters.description: 0-based column number at the end of the selection range

remarks:
The range of table cells are only used for a selection made in a table. For all other types of selections, these values are ignored.
By default, the value for FirstRow, LastRow, FirstColumn, and LastColumn is -1, which indicates that the entire table is selected.
